Entries.74: Winter's almost here. Make sure you're prepared to feed your animals hay over the winter, because they don't like going outside in the cold. Also, your grass won't keep growing after that first frost. Each silo can hold 1000 pieces of hay, so make sure to do the math and figure out if you need to build any more!
